title: Great location, modern rooms and the smallest elevator ever
text:
I really liked the hotel. The rooms were fresh in repair and neat, wi-fi was ultrafast, the personnel was nice and they did not even check the minibar when we were checking out! That was truly charming - when we said we used water and paid for it, the manager just believed us and replied that they trust their clients, and i totally love this approach - as both interest groups should feel trust in each other. However, I'd suggest the hotel to put the hotel sign in bigger fonts on the outside, as the first time I just merely missed it and confused with the bank situated next to it. And the elevator is ludicrously cramp - I barely fit there myself with my luggage :D Apart from that no complaints) Very nice hotel!
